content.rendered:
Directed by Sujoy Ghosh.

Written by Suresh Nair. Sujoy Ghosh. Ritesh Shah. Sujoy Ghosh.

Cast Vidya Balan(Durga Rani Singh / Vidya Sinha). Arjun Rampal(Sub-inspector Inderjeet Singh). Jugal Hansraj(Mohit Dewan). Kharaj Mukherjee(Inspector Pranab Halder). Tota Roy Chowdhury(Arun). Naisha Khanna(Child Minnie). Tunisha Sharma(Teen Minnie). Manini Chadha(Rashmi Singh). Amba Sanyal(Mrs. Dewan). Gargi Bharadwaj(Kalimpong Policewoman / Kidnapper). Pradip Mukherjee(Doctor Maity). Nitya Ganguly(Constable Ram Singh). Pradeep Chakraborty(Benu Uncle). Soma Adhikari(Minnie’s Nurse). Ardhendu Banerjee(Doctor Sen). Haridas Chatterjee(Mad Beggar). Kaushik Sen(Kalimpong Policeman (as Koushik Sen)). Biswajit Chakraborty(Lalbazaar Police Commissioner). Gulan Kripalani(Liza Mason (Minnie’s Teacher)). Jharna Mondal(Nurse Jharna (Maity’s Hospital)). Arunava Middya(Maity Hospital Receptionist). Ranodeep Bose(Goopi (Fake Passport Maker)). Dhanraj Das(Fat Man (Goopi’s Fighter)). Ahana Singh(Simran (Inder’s Daughter)). Pritha Debmoulik(Mrs. Burnett (School Principal)). Rahul Acharya(Insp. Bhatnagar (at Lalbazaar)). Mira Pal(Patient (at Maity’s Hospital)) . Michael Raymond Fox(US Immigration Officer). Susanta Joddar(Fighter). Sanjay Paul(Inspector (Inder’s Ex-colleague)). Deepak Subba(Gaurd at Scottish Missionaries)

Language Hindi.

Producers Mohammed Attarwala. Saubhik Das. Akshay Gada. Jayantilal Gada. Kushal Gada. Sujoy Ghosh. Jerrin Thomas Joseph. Bendev Junior. Reshmaa Kadakia. Suresh Nair. Ilana Rossein. Shilpan Vyas Tinu.

Production Pen Movies.
